description.plain: Joel Corry is a London based DJ, music producer and the record label owner of Most Rated Records.

body.plain: Joel Corry is a London based DJ, music producer and the record label owner of Most Rated Records.

songs.full_title: Head & Heart by Joel Corry (Ft. MNEK)
songs.title: Head & Heart

description.plain:
“Head & Heart” is the first collaboration between English producer, Joel Corry and English singer-songwriter, MNEK. The duo created a summer dance anthem with upbeat piano chords combined with MNEK’s catchy vocals—the song received acclaim, especially in the UK, reaching the number one spot on The Official Big Top 40 just two weeks after release.

MNEK sings about the conflict of thoughts between his head and his heart—this is shown through the music video, which is split in two halves, illustrating the head and the heart respectively.

In an interview with HollywoodLife, Joel Corry shared:

2020 has been a tough year, so I wanted to give people an uplifting banger and bring the positive vibes. I hope ‘Head & Heart’ becomes the soundtrack to some amazing summer memories across the world.

songs.embed_content: Read “Head & Heart” by Joel Corry on Genius

songs.lyrics:
9 ContributorsSorry Lyrics[Verse 1]
I can't live without you
I know I did you wrong, I know I did you wrong
And it's my fault, I'm sorry
I can see my whole world changing 'cause of you
It's upside down, I'm lonely
Should have known better, should have know you're my best friend
Come back here, give me one more try

[Chorus]
I can see my whole world changing
There's no need to live if I can't be with you
What I did was wrong, I'm sorry
I didn't know how much I really miss you
I can see my whole world changing
There's no need to live if I can't be with you
What I did was wrong, I'm sorry
I didn't know how much I really miss you

I know I did you wrong, I know I did you wrong

I can see my whole world changing 'cause of you

Should have known better, should have know you're my best friend

[Chorus]

There's no need to live if I can't be with you
What I did was wrong, I'm sorry
I didn't know how much I really miss you
I can see my whole world changing
There's no need to live if I can't be with you
What I did was wrong, I'm sorry
I didn't know how much I really miss you

[Verse 3]

You might also like[Chorus]

There's no need to live if I can't be with you
